item.title: Introduction
item.description: Initially I wanted to go through [[linux/linux-from-scratch/|LFS]] in a Virtual Machine. Unfortunately that didn’t play well as: emulating x86_64 architecture on Apple Silicon sucks I could use arm64 distro image in UTM, but I’d probably need to figure out architecture-related details on my own, as LFS does not cover these I’ve even installed Ubuntu Server for arm64 in a VM and the experience was bad from the very beginning.

item.title: Fetching necessary packages
item.description: I’ve began with obtaining the packages that are needed to build a basic Linux system. I went with the wget-list way.
